Description:
You reach the top of a mountain and are confronted with a great electrical storm surrounding what appears to be an ancient altar. 

It might be your imagination, but it seems like the thunder is shouting something at you.
DescriptionAction: You know with sudden certainty that the Whispering stone needs to be placed upon that altar.

    "ReplyShowCard": "",
    "ReplyText": "Obey the thunderous voices and place the stone on the altar.",
    "SSRewardText": "You draw the stone from the pouch around your neck where you have been storing it and flinch automatically as a bolt of lightning strikes directly towards you! However, the lightning is drawn into the stone and you are able to safely approach the altar.\n\nYou do not even need to place the Whispering Stone atop the altar; electricity crackles around you as the <i>entire storm<\/i> is slowly consumed by the stone, leaving calm - but ominous - skies.",
